Riri Anak Sopir Truk Raih Lulusan Terbaik Taruni Akademi AL
02 Nov 2019, 03:22 by Tim detikcom
Magelang - Sungguh bahagia hati pasangan suami-istri Darmadi dan Devi Lestari melihat putrinya Riri Darma Putri diwisuda sebagai lulusan terbaik Taruni Akademi Angkatan Laut (AAL). Darmadi yang berprofesi sebagai sopir truk mengaku butuh perjuangan untuk bisa menghadiri wisuda putrinya.
Wisuda tersebut digelar pada hari Jumat (1/11) di lapangan Sapta Marga Akmil Magelang, Jawa Tengah dan dihadiri Panglima TNI Marsekal Hadi Tjahjanto. Riri dipanggil ke tengah lapangan sebagai lulusan terbaik.
Butuh perjuangan panjang bagi keluarga Darmadi untuk bisa menghadiri acara wisuda Riri. Dengan menggunakan mobil dari seorang teman baik yang memiliki bisnis mobil rental, keluarga ini berangkat dari Padang, Sumatera Barat. Darmadi merangkap sebagai sopir tunggal, bersama empat orang adik-adik Riri.
"Saya terharu ketika suatu hari Riri bertanya, apakah ayah akan datang jika wisuda. Saya jawab saya akan datang padahal belum tahu bagaimana caranya," tutur Darmadi dalam rilis yang disampaikan Pusat Penerangan TNI, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Dari Padang, keluarga Riri berangkat pada 26 Oktober 2019 dan sempat mampir di Tangerang di rumah saudara dekat untuk istirahat selama dua malam. Pada 30 Oktober 2019, mereka melanjutkan perjalanan ke Magelang.
"Saya masih seperti bermimpi. Bisa berdiri di sini dan menghadiri wisuda prajurit," ujar Darmadi.
Riri yang berhasil membuat kedua orang tuanya bangga, tak henti-hentinya memeluk kedua orang tuanya dan memeluk adik-adiknya dengan wajah haru bercampur bangga. "Tak bisa diucapkan dengan kata-kata bagaimana hari ini menjadi hari paling bahagia bagi saya dan keluarga," ucap Riri.
Wisuda Prajurit Bhayangkara Taruna 2019 dibuka oleh Marsekal Hadi dan telah mewisuda 860 prajurit Bhayangkara Taruna yang telah selesai menjalani Pendidikan Dasar Integrasi Kemitraan Akademi TNI dan Akpol Tahun 2019.

(dkp/dkp)
text:
Riri Anak Truck Driver Wins Best Taruni Academy AL Graduates
02 Nov 2019, 03:22 by Tim detikcom
Magelang - It is truly a happy heart of a married couple Darmadi and Devi Lestari to see their daughter Riri Darma Putri graduated as the best graduates of the Taruni Naval Academy (AAL). Darmadi, who works as a truck driver, claimed he needed a struggle to be able to attend his daughter's graduation.
The graduation ceremony was held on Friday (1/11) in the Sapta Marga field, Akmil Magelang, Central Java, and was attended by TNI Commander Marshal Hadi Tjahjanto. Riri was called to the middle of the field as the best graduate.
It took a long struggle for Darmadi's family to be able to attend Riri's graduation ceremony. By using a car from a good friend who has a rental car business, the family departed from Padang, West Sumatra. Darmadi concurrently as a single driver, along with four younger siblings Riri.
"I was touched when one day Riri asked if my father would come for graduation. I replied I would come even though I didn't know how," Darmadi said in a release delivered by the TNI Information Center, Saturday (11/02/2019).
From Padang, Riri's family departed on October 26, 2019 and had a chance to stop by in Tangerang at a close relative's house to rest for two nights. On 30 October 2019, they continued their journey to Magelang.
"I am still dreaming. Being able to stand here and attend a soldier's graduation," Darmadi said.
Riri who managed to make her parents proud, endlessly hugged her parents and embraced her younger siblings with emotionless faces mixed with pride. "It cannot be said in words how today is the happiest day for me and my family," said Riri.
The graduation of the 2019 Bhayangkara Taruna Warrior was opened by Marshal Hadi and graduated 860 Bhayangkara Taruna soldiers who had completed the Basic Education Integration of the TNI and Akpol Academic Partnership in 2019.
